home.title: Website Analysis & Security Scanner
home.subtitle: Get a full tech stack breakdown, security checks, performance metrics, SEO insights and over 30+ other checks on any website.
home.description: In just 20 seconds, you can see

about.instant_analysis: you can view and analyse key website information in an instant

api.title: API
api.description: Get started with the Web Check API.
api.heading: Web Check API
api.intro_line1: The Web Check API gives you programatic access to over 30 categories of web metrics.
api.intro_line2: Integrate into your own workflows and applications, to monitor any website's performance, SEO, security, and more.
api.doc_description: View listing of all available endpoints, their usage, output and examples.
api.key_description: Get your API key, and start using the API.
api.source_description: View, edit, download or deploy the API from source.

account.title: Account
account.description: Login or sign up for a free account on Web Check, to manage API access, save reports, enable website change notificiations and more!
account.under_development: Account management is currently under development.
account.future_features: Once complete, you will be able to login to your account to manage API access, save reports, enable website change notificiations and more!

self_host.title: Self-Hosted Setup
self_host.description: Get started with running Web Check locally or on your own server.
self_host.heading: Self-Hosted Setup
self_host.intro: Get your own free instance of Web Check, running locally or on your server.
self_host.docker_description: Just one command, and you'll have your own Web Check instance running on your server in minutes.
self_host.one_click_description: Don't have a server? Not a problem! Deploy Web Check with one click on Vercel or Netlify.
self_host.source_description: Want to customize Web Check? Clone the repository and deploy it on your server.
